Key:
(Now, then... It's good that I invited Tohka out
on a date tomorrow, but will she really
go with me...?)

(Well... It's not like I have
any particular plans.)

(No... If I try thinking too hard, I'll just mess
up again. So I just have to throw my feelings
at her, and let them shatter if they will.)
Now, and from here on out―
Sh-Shido...?
T-Tohka?! Why are you here...?
I... heard from Rinne...
F-From Rinne...?
Yes...

(...Had I told Rinne that I was going here?
W-Well, whatever... That's not important
right now...)
Hey, Shido...?
Hm! Wh-What is it...?
How do you... feel about Rinne, Shido?
Huh? H-How...? Well...
Just a childhood friend.
Someone I'm interested in.
She's just a childhood friend, of course.
Hm...? Rinne is... your ideal wife, is she not?
Huh...?
Y-You know, that thing... m-marriage!
M-Marriage?!

Marriage is when two people who love each other
promise to be together forever, yes? So, Sh-Shido,
you... you said Rinne was an ideal wife, right?
Th-That's... Well, you see...!
I knew it...
No! That's not it! Don't misunderstand me!
Hmm...?
I-It's true that Rinne would make a good wife...
Ngh! See, I knew it!
P-Please, just hear me out!
Hm...

But right now, I don't think of Rinne in that
way... And I'm not planning on marrying her.
I-Is that true...?

Yeah...
And right now, the one thing I'm sure of...
Right now... I want to be with you, Tohka!

So, Tohka... Please keep your promise
for tomorrow. Or... will you not?
I-I can, absolutely...!

Really?! Then, it's all right?
Haha, I'm looking forward to it.

Yes, then, tomorrow... I'm...
looking forward to it as well.
Y-Yeah. I-I'll see you tomorrow!
(Whew... I feel like my feelings got through.)

(There really are times when you just have to face
a person with your true feelings.)

(Well, my head's cooled off, I guess I'll go home
and get ready for tomorrow...)

To be honest... I'd be lying if I said I wasn't
interested, but...
I knew it...
Hmm...? Tohka?

So, I really... have no place...
in your future, Shido...?
Huh, er, no... I, um―!
*Sniffle*! *Sob*...!
H-Hey! Tohka?! Are you okay?!
I... don't... want...! To not... be with Shido...!

Wha―! Tohka! This is bad! At this rate...!
Please calm down!
UWAAAAAAAH!!!!
A-Aaagh! UWAAAAAHHH...?!
(All right, tomorrow's my date with Tohka...)

(I don't know if there's anything I can do...
But I want her to go back to her normal self.)

(I'll try not to think too hard about things, and
just face her with the feelings I have as I go.)
Yes? Come in...
R-Rinne? What's wrong, all of a sudden?
There was something I wanted to ask you, Shido.
Something you wanted to ask me?

Yes, I wanted to ask you.
Shido... You've decided, haven't you?
Er, ah... Yeah...
What are you talking about?
You decided that... You want to save Tohka.

Oh... Yeah. I can't watch Tohka be like this,
and I can't leave her alone. Not only that,
but Tohka was trying her best for me―

You want to be by Tohka's side...
That's what I'm thinking.
I see. So that's your answer, Shido.
Yeah. That's what I've decided.
Hey, Shido... Can you promise me something?
Promise...? What...?

Promise that from now on, you'll cherish
Tohka-chan. No matter what happens,
you won't let her go... Promise me.

Wh-What are you talking about?
You don't have to ask me to do that...

Please, I want you to promise me. That you'll only
think of Tohka-chan... Otherwise, I'm sure that
your heart will one day distance itself from her.
Rinne...
Please...

I understand... I promise.
As a man, I won't take back what I've said.
I'll... cherish Tohka, absolutely.
Yeah... I knew you would promise me, Shido.
Haha, what do you mean by that?

I believe in you, Shido...
Don't forget your promise... Don't ever break it.
Yeah, of course.
If you break it, you won't get off easy, okay?
I-I know!
I see... Then it's good.
Wh-What is it? Why do you have to threaten me?
Hehe... Sorry.
But...

You'll be fine.
If it's you, you'll be fine... I'm sure of it.
Wh-What was that just now?!
Hey, Rinne... Did you just see―

Huh? Rinne's gone?
When did she...?

Well, it is pretty late...
I should head to bed as well.

...In this dream... no one can become happy...
Shido Itsuka... I hope your next dream will be
a happy one...
